name: Notice of child support debt
text: §346-37.3  Notice of child support debt.  The department shall notify the child support enforcement agency of the amount of, and the periods during which, public assistance was provided to or for the benefit of any dependent child or children. [L 1975, c 137, pt of §1; am L 1986, c 332, §9; am L 2002, c 72, §2]
